text: aur agar (kaheen) khuda apane bandon kee naapharamaaniyon kee girafat karata to rue zameen par kisee ek jaanadaar ko baaqee na chhodata magar vah to ek muqarrar vakt tak un sabako mohalat deta hai phir jab unaka (vah) vakt aa pahunchega to na ek ghadee peechhe hat sakate hain aur na aage badh sakate hain
